text: Vice-Admiral Sir Edwin John Horlick KBE FREng FIMechE MIMarEST (28 September 1925 – 12 November 2021) was a British Navy Vice Admiral. He was Director General of British Ships from 1979 to 1983, and as Chief Naval Engineer Officer from 1981 to 1983.Who’s Who 1998, Published by A&C; Black Limited Horlick died on 12 November 2021, at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British military people
title: Ted Horlick
